description: Retrieves the list of instances (also called nodes interchangeably) in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The string name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker HyperPod cluster in which you want to retrieve the list of nodes.

parameters.name: CreationTimeAfter
parameters.description: A filter that returns nodes in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster created after the specified time. Timestamps are formatted according to the ISO 8601 standard. Acceptable formats include: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssTZD (UTC), for example, 2014-10-01T20:30:00.000Z YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssTZD (with offset), for example, 2014-10-01T12:30:00.000-08:00 YYYY-MM-DD, for example, 2014-10-01 Unix time in seconds, for example, 1412195400. This is also referred to as Unix Epoch time and represents the number of seconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. For more information about the timestamp format, see Timestamp in the Amazon Web Services Command Line Interface User Guide.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next token specified for listing instances in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterNodeSummaries
nested_items.description: The summaries of listed instances in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the instance group in which the instance is.

nested_items.name: LaunchTime
nested_items.description: The time when the instance is launched.

nested_items.name: LastSoftwareUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time when SageMaker last updated the software of the instances in the cluster.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of an instance in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message from an instance in a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.
